title: SKOUSEN: Democrats Seek to Impeach Trump
text:
House Speaker Nancy Pelosi finally has given into the desperate Democrats who hate all things involving President Trump and called for impeachment hearings.

Is history repeating itself? I remember the Republicans impeaching President Bill Clinton for his sexual escapades in the White House. However, the move backfired and Clinton survived.

In fact, the 1990s under Clinton were a boom time in terms of the economy and the stock market. The same could be said about the Trump years. We’ve had a booming economy and a bull market on Wall Street.

The Democrats and the establishment media are trying to make the 2020 elections all about the environment and global warming. But for the average voter, the real issues are the economy and pocketbook issues. And if President Trump can hang on and not stumble again, he’s likely to win reelection.
